name: Oumaima Makhlouk
quote: Unique, Rich & high quality content!! I have learned a lot of things, thank you for your efforts!

name: Anas AIT BAHA
quote: Geeks BlaBla is the best place where you can have an idea about whatever IT topic you want from experts, simplified enough!

name: Afaf RIDAOUI
quote: Personally, I find it so beneficial and the way of choosing topics and stuff is amazing. good job ‚ù§üëç.

name: Othmane Kinane
quote: One of the few darija speaking tech podcast. Always a pleasure to listen to, and was honored to be a guest in one of the episodes. I discovered some amazing people from around

name: Badr Bellaj
quote: Geeksblabla is an excellent live streaming program for developers. I had the pleasure to be a guest therein. Honestly, I liked the decontracted atmosphere and the ability to interact live with other developers, it was really cool, fun and constructive.

name: Ahmed NFAIHI
quote: Honestly, Geeksblabla is a great concept to share knowledge and experiences in Tech between developers. Organized and presented by a fabulous team where its members share the same passion.

name: Mohamed ELBARCHANY
quote: GeeksBlabla is one of the few Podcasts I'm addicted to. Love the variety of topics and guests. Thanks to this kind of initiatives, Moroccan dev community is more active than ever!

name: Ilias Haddad
quote: One of my favorite darija speaking tech podcast. Keep up the great work and thank you for your efforts!

name: Arbaoui Mehdi
quote: I enjoy listening to the podcasts, plus I love how you approach subjects in a natural and fun way. THANKS FOR LETTING US HEARING YOUR VOICE.
